text: Wolves of the Air is a 1927 American silent action movie directed by Francis Ford and starring Johnnie Walker, Lois Boyd, Maurice Costello, Mildred Harris, Gayne Whitman, Billy Bletcher. It was distributed by Sterling Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1927 movies Category:American silent movies Category:American action movies Category:Movies directed by Francis Ford
title: Wolves of the Air
